channel.title: Birthday on LGW's Random Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Birthday on LGW's Random Ramblings

item.title: I'm turning 50!!
item.description:
As I approach the half-century mark of life, I believe it’s time to reflect on the past, examine the present, and plan for the future.

That’s going to be my focus for 2025 on this blog. Of course, there will be some fun articles as well to mix it up.

Let me know what you think as time goes on. I’d love your feedback.
